name: Make your mommy smile
description:
Here is a game I have made for a mini game jam of a day and a half.

the theme was in french and was "souris" that could mean mouse, or the verb smile.

It's play with only the left and right arrows.

the story:

you play as little girl who must collect flower to bring them to her mother to make her smile.

hope you will enjoy the game and see you later for another game.
